name: PHASESoundEvent.PrepareState
desc: Indicates the state of sound-event preparation.

items.name: case prepareInProgress
items.desc: Indicates that the sound event prepares for playback.

items.name: case prepareNotStarted
items.desc: Indicates that the sound event awaits preparation.

items.name: case prepared
items.desc: Indicates that the sound event preparation is complete.
